8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"The Messenger of Allah would Yujawir (stay in I'tikaf) during the last ten (nights) of Ramadan and he said: 'Seek the Night of Al-Qadr during the last ten (nights) of Ramadan

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Night of Al-Qadr
